Ingredients
Ice

3/4

lime juice

1/4

Fernet Branca
Mint leaf

Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add rum, lime juice, passion fruit syrup, and Fernet Branca. Shake 15 seconds. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with mint leaf.

Cocktail shaker, strainer
